Board.name: wordprocessor
Board.author: Bruno coudoin
Board.title: Your word processor
Board.description: A simple word processor to enter and save any text
Board.prerequisite: The children can type their own text or copy one given by the teacher.
Board.goal: Learn how to enter text in a wordprocessor. This wordprocessor is special in that it enforces the use of styles. This way, the children will understand their benefit when moving to more feature full wordprocessor like LibreOffice.
Board.manual: In this wordprocessor you can type the text you want, save and get it back later. You can add some style to your text by using the buttons on the left. The first 4 buttons let you select the style of the line on which your insert cursor is. The 2 others buttons with multiple choices let you select from a predefined document and color theme.
